clip.quote: When you don't have another option, but for it to work, it has to work. And you figure out how to make it work.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statement captures the essence of resilience and determination.
clip.suggested_hook: What would you do if you had no other option but to succeed?

clip.quote: I would go to a coffee shop and buy everyone's coffee for two hours. They'd come introduce themselves to me.
clip.why_clipworthy: This is a unique and actionable networking strategy.
clip.suggested_hook: Want to build your network fast? Try this unconventional tactic.

script:
```json
{
  "script": {
    "HOOK": "Want to build your network fast? Try this unconventional tactic.",
    "SETUP": "Meet Matt Kierkegaard, a real estate pro who transitioned from music. He shares a unique networking strategy you won't want to miss.",
    "INSIGHT": "Matt would go to a coffee shop and buy everyone's coffee for two hours. This simple act encouraged people to introduce themselves to him.",
    "REFRAME/APPLICATION": "This tactic is a game-changer for building connections. Apply it to your business by creating memorable experiences that spark conversations.",
    "CTA": "Think outside the box. What unique strategy will you try next to expand your network?"
  },
```
